# Autofocus

Take pictures using autofocus.

1. Use **AF/MF SETTING > FOCUS MODE** to choose **SINGLE AF** or **CONTINUOUS AF** (ðŸ“– 69).

2. Use **AF/MF SETTING > AF MODE** to choose an AF mode (ðŸ“– 71).

3. Select **AF/MF SETTING > FOCUS AREA** and choose the position and size of the focus frame (ðŸ“– 73).

4. Take pictures.
